name: Doomed Rogue
description:
A small demon awakes in a dungeon with weapons from another age.

Made for the first Miz Jam.

Music by Christopher Moore.

Programmed by Marcus Moore with concepts and level design assistance from Sam Clifford.

Controls:

WASD to move character.

Left Click to shoot.

1,2,3,4 to switch weapons.

Esc to quit out of the game.

Thanks for playing!
